#include<cstdio>
#include<iostream>
#include<vector>
#include<cstring>
#include<algorithm>
#include<set>
#include<cmath>
#include<bitset>
#include<map>
#include<queue>
#include<stack>
#define test(t) while(t--)
#define cin(n) scanf("%lld",&n)
#define cout(n) printf("%lld\n",n)
#define rep(i,a,n) for(i=a;i<=n;i++)
#define vi vector<long long>
#define vii vector< vector<long long> >
#define vpii vector< pair<long long,long long> >
#define mii map<long long,long long>
#define pb push_back
#define mp make_pair
#define imax (long long) 1000000007
#define ill long long
#define gc getchar_unlocked
void fcin(long long &x){register long long c = gc();x = 0;for(;(c<48 || c>57);c = gc());for(;c>47 && c<58;c = gc()) {x = (x<<1) + (x<<3) + c - 48;}}
using namespace std;


int main()
{
	long long t,i,l,m,p,n,s,k;vi a,b;
	fcin(t);
	test(t)
	{
		a.clear();b.clear();
		fcin(n);fcin(k);a.resize(n);b.resize(n);
		rep(i,0,n-1)
		{
			fcin(a[i]);
		}
		if(k>=((n-1)/2))
		{
			m=a[0];
			rep(i,1,n-1) m&=a[i];
			rep(i,0,n-1) printf("%lld ",m);printf("\n");continue;
		}
		l=1;s=1;
		while(l<=k)
		{
			rep(i,0,n-1)
			{
				b[i]=a[i];
				b[i]&=a[(i+s)%n]&a[(i-s+n)%n];
			}
			rep(i,0,n-1)
			{
				a[i]=b[i];
			}
			s*=3;
			l+=s;
		}
		if(l>k)
		{
			s +=k-l;
			rep(i,0,n-1)
			{
				b[i]=a[i];
				b[i]&=a[(i+s)%n]&a[(i-s+n)%n];
			}
			rep(i,0,n-1)
			{
				a[i]=b[i];
			}
		}
		rep(i,0,n-1) printf("%lld ",a[i]);
		printf("\n");
	}
	return 0;
}
